text:
Hello,

Sorry for such a late reply.

That's amazing that you had a placement and it's great that they want to you back after you've graduated. 

But yes, best to apply everywhere you can and then have options =]

Looks like you have it all figured out. Sorry I haven't really been on here, but if you have any questions, feel free to ask and I will try to check the app more often as I am still not getting any notifications.

When are you graduating? Must be really soon?

All the best,

Elise
